abstract: Daimler AG says it is conducting internal probe of its certification process for diesel exhaust emissions in United States at request of Justice Dept.
lead_paragraph: At the request of the Justice Department, the German automaker said it was conducting an internal investigation regarding diesel exhaust emissions.

headline.main: Daimler to Investigate Its Diesel Emissions in the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Daimler to Investigate Its U.S. Diesel Emissions

snippet: At the request of the Justice Department, the German automaker said it was conducting an internal investigation regarding diesel exhaust emissions.
